releaseNotes: Comprehensive testing and prevention strategy to eliminate cross-domain data type errors and missing database session parameters. Major achievements: (1) Created enum conversion testing framework preventing SessionSource.CLIENT-style bugs; (2) Built repository layer validation tests ensuring proper domain â†” database conversions; (3) Implemented API endpoint parameter validation detecting missing db session parameters; (4) Created architecture compliance checker script with 13 critical violation detection; (5) Enhanced Makefile with specialized testing commands (test-enum-conversions, test-repository-layers, test-api-parameters, check-architecture); (6) Updated refactor architecture documentation with prevention strategy; (7) Fixed audio upload UX issues (session ID display, faster polling, smooth transitions); (8) Resolved coaching session creation enum mismatch bug. Multi-layer protection system ensures future cross-domain issues are caught early in development lifecycle.
author: Coachly Team
